content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a legal case involving a party who is owed 101500 euros the court has made a final decision regarding the objections raised in the case declaring the dissolution of a community of heirs resulting from the death of a person named b the court has assigned exclusive ownership of certain properties to different parties including a property on the first floor and a piece of land to party r a property on the ground floor and several pieces of land to party b aa and another property to party b additionally shares of land have been assigned to parties c and n each party is obligated to make certain payments for the adjustment of the estate the court appointed an expert to assess the assets and propose a division plan which was accepted by the court the court also addressed the issue of collation and determined the allocation of costs including expenses for the division and legal fees
